thread.title: Twitter can’t make it’s mind up about Mesut Ozil’s performance
thread.title_full: Twitter can’t make it’s mind up about Mesut Ozil’s performance

author: Rebecca Knight
title: Twitter can’t make it’s mind up about Mesut Ozil’s performance
text:
Twitter can’t make it’s mind up about Mesut Ozil’s performance By Rebecca Knight   Conflicting opinions 
Arsenal fans love to moan, and they love to disagree with each other, so to say that they were at odds over Mesut Ozil’s performance against Bayern Munich shouldn’t come as much of a shock. 
The Gunners were in and out of the game, but the majority of people felt Ozil was just plain out of it, and his work or lack there of it for the first goal scored by Arjen Robben for Bayern was simply terrible. 
He also missed a couple of really good chances, yet some fans felt he was working and doing as much as he could. 
Of course, Twitter loved it. The best of Twitter If Ozil had missed tht penalty,he wouldn't score again..Will just stood there with his lazy ass nd not bother..Difference btw him and Alexis Good from Sanchez tho.. he missed and reacted fast. Ozil would've stayed there looking at the sky 
—
